name: Add new Elastic Email contacts to a Google Spreadsheets
description: Every time a new contact is added to Elastic Email list, Make will automatically add contact to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/150MxvpoTzxtuFOiGBaZwAVYOkbLZSt8Gt81E4k_hZQA/edit?usp=sharing).
